creator: roxspring@imapmail.org
text:
It would be really handy if log files could be dropped into chainsaw.  E.g. log
is dragged direct from explorer or winzip and appears in a new tab.

I actually know how to do this, and it's a good idea.  Is there any component on 
the Chainsaw GUI that is the most intuitive to "accept" the drop, or should we 
just make any component pretty much be able to accept the drop.
creator: psmith@apache.org
roxspring@imapmail.org
text:
The main table seems the obvious place to me, though dropping anywhere covers
that too :)

creator: psmith@apache.org
text:
This is now implemented.  You can drag & drop files to the tabbed pane.  You 
should see it decorate the tabbed pane with a black border to highlight that it 
can accept the drop.  Drop away, and then the file will be loaded by a 
background thread.

Let me know what you think, re-open this bug if you can think of anything 
related to this item.
